description: A security violation was detected. The secLastErrorCode
indicates the type of error/violation, the
secLastErrorAddress indicates the involved MAC address.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD WL400-DOT11EXT-MIB::securityViolation WL400-DOT11EXT-MIB::secLastError s EXAMPLE WL400-DOT11EXT-MIB::secLastErrorAddress s EXAMPL

description: When a security violation or error occurs, the error
code is written to this variable in the form of a string.
variables.name: WL400-DOT11EXT-MIB::secLastError

description: When a security violation or error occurs, the MAC
address involved in the violation or error is written
variables.name: WL400-DOT11EXT-MIB::secLastErrorAddress
